org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist
Class FormListUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.FormListUtil

public class FormListUtil
extends Object

Utility methods for adding buttons to FormListWidget rows and tracking state changes.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)

addSaveButtonToRowForm

public static ButtonControl addSaveButtonToRowForm(String labelId,
                                                   BaseFormListWidget editableRows,
                                                   FormWidget rowForm,
                                                   Object key)
Adds a save button to the given row form. Save button has id "save" and will save the specified row when pressed by user.

Parameters:
labelId - button label id.
editableRows - editable rows widget.
rowForm - row form.
key - row key.
Throws:
Exception

                                                     BaseFormListWidget editableRows,
                                                     FormWidget rowForm,
                                                     Object key)
Adds a delete button to the given row form. Delete button has id "delete" and will delete the specified row when pressed by user.

Parameters:

editableRows - editable rows widget.
rowForm - row form.
key - row key.

addOpenCloseButtonToRowForm

public static ButtonControl addOpenCloseButtonToRowForm(String labelId,
                                                        BaseFormListWidget editableRows,
                                                        FormWidget rowForm,
                                                        Object key)
Adds an open/close button to the given row form. Open/close button has id "openClose" and will open or close (negate the current status) the specified row when pressed by user.

Parameters:
labelId - button label id.
editableRows - editable rows widget.
rowForm - row form.
key - row key.
Throws:
Exception

addEditSaveButtonToRowForm

public static ButtonControl addEditSaveButtonToRowForm(String labelId,
                                                       BaseFormListWidget editableRows,
                                                       FormWidget rowForm,
                                                       Object key)
Adds an edit/save button to the given row form. Edit/save button has id "editSave" and will open or close (negate the current status) the specified row when pressed by user. Additionally when the row is closed it will save the row.

Parameters:
labelId - button label id.
editableRows - editable rows widget.
rowForm - row form.
key - row key.
Throws:
Exception

addAddButtonToAddForm

public static ButtonControl addAddButtonToAddForm(String labelId,
                                                  BaseFormListWidget editableRows,
                                                  FormWidget addForm)
Adds an add button to the given add form. Add button has id "add" and will add the row from the add form when pressed by user.

Parameters:
labelId - button label id.
editableRows - editable rows widget.
addForm - add form.
Throws:
Exception

isRowFormsStateChanged

public static boolean isRowFormsStateChanged(Map editableRows)
Returns whether the editable rows forms have been edited since last save. Note that for this method to work correctly programmer must call FormWidget.markBaseState() method when initializing and saving rows.

Parameters:
editableRows - editable rows.
Returns:
whether the editable rows have been edited since last save.

convertAndValidateRowForms

public static boolean convertAndValidateRowForms(Map editableRows)
Converts and validates all editable row forms and returns wtether they were all valid.

Parameters:
editableRows - editable rows.
Returns:
Converts and validates all editable row forms and returns wtether they were all valid.
Throws:
Exception
